mapper.insert:
select music_seq.nextval from dual
insert into music( music_id, music_name, music_artist_id, music_genre, music_lyrics ) values ( #{music_id}, #{music_name}, #{music_artist_id}, #{music_genre}, #{music_lyrics} )
mapper.select: select m.music_id, m.music_name, m.music_artist_id, a.artist_name, m.music_genre, m.music_lyrics, m.music_playcount, m.music_like from music m join artist a on (m.music_artist_id = a.artist_id) order by music_id desc

select m.music_id, m.music_name, m.music_artist_id, a.artist_name, m.music_genre, m.music_lyrics, m.music_playcount, m.music_like from music m join artist a on (m.music_artist_id = a.artist_id) where m.music_id = #{music_id}

select m.music_id, m.music_name, m.music_artist_id, a.artist_name, m.music_genre, m.music_lyrics, m.music_playcount, m.music_like from music m join artist a on (m.music_artist_id = a.artist_id) where music_genre = #{music_genre}

select m.music_id, m.music_name, m.music_artist_id, a.artist_name, m.music_genre, m.music_lyrics, m.music_playcount, m.music_like from music m join artist a on (m.music_artist_id = a.artist_id) order by music_like desc

select * from music where
music_id = #{music_id}
or music_name = like '%' || #{music_name} || '%'
or music_lyrics = like '%' || #{music_lyrics} || '%'
